## mug add functionGroup

Adds a new function group, you can then add functions to with 'mug add function -r name [flags]'

### Synopsis

Adds a new function group, you can then add functions to with 'mug add function -r name [flags]'

```
mug add functionGroup name [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for functionGroup
```
